title: 1.6.6会是1.7之前的最后一个版本吗？
author: aizuo
txt_content:
工业mod居然为1.6.6更新了……

中世纪mod也为1.6.6退出了大量更新，changelog比前5个版本加起来还要多，感觉这些作者都是憋了好久就等今天的那种感觉……

还是其实这是我的幻觉？1.6.7 1.6.8就在街角……

replies.author: pathfinder
replies.txt_content:
回复 baizuo 的帖子

难说……真的难说，这个得问Notch

replies.author: maxsunma
replies.txt_content: 至少暂时不会更新了，Notch要去E3了。1.6.6多半是1.7前最后一个版本没跑了

replies.author: ToNick
replies.txt_content: 难道这些mod作者都知道内幕@？

replies.author: ossfang7878
replies.txt_content: 明显是Notch在官网论坛发帖说了，不然就是发过邮件给Moder了……

replies.author: xdoncy
replies.txt_content:
好像有看到說是最後一個版本.....
除非重大BUG 要不然他會直接跳1.7

BU服也推出 1.6版了~
(不過為什CPU還是使用很高........)

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
引述官方論壇首頁的新聞: 

Minecraft 1.7 Will Be The "Adventure Update"

29 May 2011 - 09:32 PM Posted By Kody

Heads up, Minecrafters! The next big update to Minecraft beta will be patch 1.7, according to Notch. While he says it will be a while before it goes live, there was also a hint given at what's coming. It's going to be the "Adventure Update" or something similar to that, says Notch.

What's up with Minecraft before 1.7? Well, next week we're going to be seeing 1.6.6 release, which will be an update to address issues with the recently released patch 1.6. The following week Notch will be headed to the United States -- and Los Angeles in particular -- to spend some time at E3. We'll be there too, so hopefully we can pick his brain about 1.7.

Finally, a buzz kill for folks who enjoy rumors. Minecraft: Source is a false one.

==================================================
Notch本人部落格內容:

31 May 2011

Minecraft Beta 1.6.6

Unless there are any emergency things to fix, I won’t do any more updates before 1.7. Going to E3 on Saturday.

I will be bringing my laptop to do some development, but I won’t be able to do much testing.

ONWARDS TO THE ADVENTURE UPDATE! *holds up sword, poses dramatically*

replies.author: aizuo
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 baizuo 于 2011-6-2 10:08 编辑 

看见了，肯定是在更新博客文前先通知mod作者鸟，好，可以开始收集咯！
做一个1.6.6整合版作为纪念……

replies.author: fortomxq
replies.txt_content: 不错……需要随时关注作者发言……

replies.author: CDGD
replies.txt_content:
回复 papermoon 的帖子

肯定的！
